topic.title: How to create an Invoice
topic.shortdesc: invoices are documents used to record transactions between sellers and their customers. any goods or services purchased on credit will usually have the terms of the deal specifide in the invoice as well as provide information on the available methods of payment. Receipts, bill of sales, debit notse, and sales invoices are all possible different invoice types..

ol.li: Click on Invoices, located Under the sales tab. The screen that alows you to create an invoice will now appear.
The first step if possible is to add your logo to the invoice. Branding your document will make your invoices recongizable to your customers..
Select a template for the invoice. It is based on your personal preference as there are many to choose from. This will be the layout of your invoice.
select which accent color to display on the document. Choosing a color that best matches your branding is recommended.
Select "Looks great, let's go". To skip customizing your invoice, click skips this.
On the next screen, type in the invoice title and a summary of the invoice. The invoice title should be recognizable. the summary should be as descriptive as possible.
select which customer to send the bill to.
Type in the S.O/P.O and Invoice number.
Select which date the esitmate starts and ends.
Add the cost by selecting the product.
Type in a description for the product in the description box. Be as detailed as possible.
Add the products price and tax.
Select which type of currency the estimate uses. Wave Financial has multiple choices of currency to choose from spanning from economies across the world.
If needed, fill out the foot and notes section.
Select save to add the invoice.
The next screen will require approval of the draft. Select approve and the invoice will be sent to the customer.
The draft is now created and sent to your customer. You will hAVE to wait for the customers to pay their invoice.
